thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 9 of 265
thread.title: Krista

author: Krista
title: Krista
text: We have been using HelloFresh for about 5 weeks and we love it. We tried the four meals for two option based on a coworker's recommendation. The meals offer a variety of ingredients that we hadn't used before so it was a nice change from our regular dinner planning. We also enjoy more free time because we are shopping at the grocery store less and don't waste as much food. All the options offer a well rounded meal and are easy to prepare.
